text: Zai an la zhengjiu women tuoli nimen de zongjiao hou, jiaru women zai fanhui nimen de zongjiao zhong, name, women que yi jie an la de mingyi niezao huangyan. Women jue bu fanhui nimen de zongjiao, chufei an la——women de zhu yiyu. Women de zhu zai zhishi fangmian shi baoluo wanwu de, women zhi xinlai an la. Women de zhu a! Qiu ni zai women he women de zuren zhi jian yi zhenli panjue ba! Ni shi zui hao de panjue zhe.”
